snippet.title: Super Slime Arena 5 Minute Raw Gameplay [Beta footage]
snippet.description:
Unedited gameplay footage (with placeholder art and music) of a six player Shuffle mode match. Every character has one unique attack and all attacks are one-hit KO's. In Shuffle mode every time you die you come back as another slime going through all of them in a random order. We currently have 32 different characters.

For more information check out superslimearena.net

UPDATE: Game is released!

Buy it here! Humble and itch sales also include Steam key!

https://jellyteam.itch.io/super-slime-arena https://www.humblebundle.com/g/super_slime_arena http://store.steampowered.com/app/706960/Super_Slime_Arena/
